name: Flappy Unicorn (Very Easy)
description:
FLAPPY UNICORN is VERY EASY to play FOR ALL AGES AND GENDERS, designed to help those frustrated with other similar games, like the famous Flappy Bird… this one you can definitely, easily win!!!!

And you’ll love the Animated Unicorn…. and collect falling stars. (The animate Unicorn in this App is not silly looking, it is beautiful, more natural.)

Compete with others worldwide in GameCenter LeaderBoard and share with your friends onTwitter, FaceBook, Email and Apple iMessage directly within this App.

The Sound FX, Graphics and Animation alone are totally worth playing this great, entertaining game:^)

Features:

• VERY EASY TO PLAY, YOU WILL WIN!!!!
• Very Funny and just way too much fun!:^)
• Incredible Sound FX & BG Track (By Award Winning Sound Designer / Music Creator)
• Great Graphics and Animation
• Game Center Support with LeaderBoard
• Post to Twitter within App (GameCenter Share)
• Post to Facebook within App (GameCenter Share)
• Email within App (GameCenter Share)
• Apple iMessage within App (GameCenter Share)

Flappy Unicorn (Very Easy) by JohnAvatar.com
